paper_abstract: We present an algorithm for computing the 2-group (Cl) over tilde (res)(F) of narrow logarithmic divisor classes of degree 0 for number fields F. As an application, we compute in some cases the 2-rank of the wild kernel WK(2)(F) and the 2-rank of its subgroup K(2)(infinity) (F) := 2 boolean AND(n >= 1) K(2)(n)(F) of infinite height elements in K(2)(F). (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Computation of 2-groups of narrow logarithmic divisor classes of number fields
